alert.note: Alert for Bannock; Bear Lake; Caribou (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:19PM MDT until July 27 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Caribou County in southeastern Idaho... East central Bannock County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Bear Lake County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 419 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grace, or 9 miles east of Lava Hot Springs, moving northeast at 20 to 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Soda Springs, Grace, Georgetown Summit, and Niter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
